.. _installation:

Installation
============

lofti_gaiaDR2 is registered on pip, and can be easily installed using:

.. code-block:: bash
	
	$ pip install lofti_gaiaDR2

It depends on numpy, matplotlib, astropy, and astroquery, which can all also be installed using pip.
It is written for python 3.7, I cannot guarantee full functionaility for python 2.
